altTitles.ja: 毒を喰らわば皿まで

description.en: The Kingdom of Parsemis is a land blessed by an ancient dragon. In this kingdom, the evil Prime Minister Andrim remembers his past life while his daughter's marriage engagement to the crown prince is being broken. At the same time, he realizes that this world is that of an otome game that he was playing in his past life. In the game, his daughter is the evil fiancée of the crown prince and he is destined to be executed alongside her. Unable to accept this, Andrim devises a plan to trap the game's conquest targets, who side with the crown prince. He will stop at nothing for revenge including seducing his own rival...

title.en: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Rei - Irotoutoshi-hen

altTitles.ja: ひぐらしのなく頃に令 色尊し編

description.en: Sequel to Higurashi no Naku Koro Ni Hoshiwatashi-hen and Higurashi no Naku Koro Ni Oniokoshi-hen.

title.en: Yankee Manga ni Tensei shitara, Naze ka Souchou ni Ezukesareteimasu.

altTitles.ja: ヤンキー漫画に転生したら、何故か総長に餌付けされています。

altTitles.en: I got Reincarnated in a Delinquent Manga, why is the Gang Leader Feeding Me?

description.en: Mashiro Youka is an ordinary, shy high school girl, except for the secret that she has memories of her previous life. And while she realizes that this world looks like a Yankee manga she read in a previous life, she lives a peaceful life as a mobster. Then one day, on her way home, she gets into a fight with some Yankees, and ends up being liked by the president of the strongest team, the Zoo...!

title.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Finding the girl behind the voice.

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

altTitles.ja: カグラバチ

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge. Epic sword battle action!
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!

description.en: After a great catastrophe stuck, humanity started living in anarchy. Acid rain floated across the sky, wild wolves roared in the wilderness, the consortium in the barrier sang night after night, and the refugees outside the wall were hungry and cold. “Ren Xiaosu”, who was born as a refugee, unlocked the palace system and continued to grow stronger by absorbing positive energy, fighting for survival, protecting relatives and friends, saving sentient beings, and gradually changing the world, becoming the dawn of mankind’s future. this is a brand new story… survive the darkness, see the light.

altTitles.en: Legend of the Hungry Wolves (Itagaki Keisuke)

altTitles.ja: 餓狼伝

description.en:
What does it mean to be strong? What attracts men to fight in hand to hand combat? These and many other questions are explained and detailed in Garouden, a novel series by Yumemakura Baku (illustrated by celebrity manga author Itagaki Keisuke).  
  
Fighting expert Bunshichi Tanba enjoys defeating TV fighting champions and celebrities on the street, until he stumbles upon the underground wrestling club known as FAW (Federation of Amateur Wrestling), and unfortunately he is defeated by one of the underdogs of the wrestling world. He forces himself to improve and looks for a rematch.  
Years later, he returns better than ever, and his fights attract the attention of the two "monsters" of the fighting world who are in constant competition, Makoto "the Great" Tatsumi, owner of the FAW and possessing a power and charisma unrivaled in the ring, and "the Demon of Karate" Matsuo Shozan, owner of the best Karate schools in Japan and possessing a power and speed that's almost godlike.  
Both will try to recruit Tanba to their own side, and Tanba will experience a wold of fighting like he has never seen, with friends and rivals everywhere, and he will have to step up to the many challenges that confront him.  
Features other martial arts characters from his other fighting novel series, The Gate of the Lions. Currently the best "serious" martial arts manga title in Japan, this is another of Baku's masterpieces that, unlike his other fantasy epic titles, has surprising realism in its deep exploration of martial arts and those who use it.

altTitles.ja: １日外出録ハンチョウ

description.en: At a certain prison under the surface, the "bottom of the bottom" that is the Teiai Underground Labor Facility, there is a man who uses his "one-day outing passes" to go above ground and enjoy all the luxuries of life while living in the poor conditions of the underground. His name is Ootsuki, and he is the leader of Squad E and a master of enjoying himself all day long with eating, drinking, and having a great time.

altTitles.ja-ro: Ani ni Tsukeru Kusuri wa nai!

altTitles.zh-ro: Kuai Ba Wo Ge Dai Zhou!

altTitles.ja: 兄に付ける薬はない！

altTitles.vi: Hãy Mang Anh Trai Tôi Đi

description.en: What's your brother like? To Miao, her brother Fen is someone who teases her and makes her go ballistic 100 times a day. There's rarely a peaceful day as the two are fighting every single minute. However, when trouble comes, Fen becomes a caring brother who protects his little sister at all costs.
description.id:
Seperti apa sosok kakak yang ada di benakmu?
Bagi Shimyo, Shifun adalah kakak paling menyebalkan sejagat raya. Bayangkan saja. Hampir setiap hari Shimyo dibuat kesal oleh tingkah konyolnya. Namun, jika Shimyo terlibat masalah, Shifun akan berubah 180 derajat menjadi sosok yang bisa diandalkan demi melindungi adik kesayangannya…
description.ja: これが中国のよくある日常!?　おバカな兄・時分（シーフン）とバイオレンスな妹・時秒（シーミョ）。仲良し（!?）兄妹が繰り広げる、ちょいゆるコメディ!!
description.ko:
패기 넘치는 카리스마 여동생 "시초",
게으른 잔머리 천재 오빠 "시분".
둘은 부모님이 이혼하자 아버지와 함께 살게 되었다.

평소에 온갖 자잘한 일로 다투기도 하고 발차기도 내지르지만
어려운 일이 있을 땐 희한할 정도로 죽이 잘 맞는 시분시초의
비글미 넘치는 스팩타클 일상물.
description.ru: Пронырливый, беспечный, вечно вляпывающийся в неловкие и нелепые ситуации — всё это в одном человеке! Ши Фэнь, в отличие от своей собранной и серьёзной младшей сестры Ши Мяо, предпочитает отлынивать от обязанностей, ждать, когда проблемы рассосутся сами, и упрощать всё до невозможности! Но какой же главный герой без лучшего друга? В Кайсиня, не менее ушлого одноклассника Ши Фэня, всегда готового поддержать любую затею близкого товарища, влюблена Ши Мяо.Маньхуа о жизни двух школьников, в которой сестре приходится расплачиваться за своего нерасторопного братца, полна забавных недоразумений и трогательных моментов!
description.vi:
Đây là một series short-comic khá nổi tiếng.
Kể về cuộc sống thường nhật của hai anh em Giờ Phút và Giờ Giây. Một ông anh hâm hâm dở dở và cô em gái bá đạo.
description.zh:
拥有一个每天耍贱整蛊妹妹、毫无家庭感的哥哥是一种什么感受，油炸还是蒸锅。时秒只希望哥哥时分彻底消失，连珍贵的生日愿望都是“快把我哥带走”。 爆笑类经典热作！每天坑妹一万次的哥哥和暴走的妹妹相爱相杀，每一话让你笑到停不下来！

---

- [Official Weibo](https://m.weibo.cn/u/3203922320)

description.en: A terrible virus has appeared in Seoul! On the same day Lee Yeongwoo and his classmates are traveling there. They are trapped in the tense atmosphere of Seoul, with the virus in the form of bubbles like frog eggs!
description.pt-br: Yeon Woo está apaixonado. Ele não tem olhos pra mais nada além da So Yeon. Na escola ele não conseguiu falar com ela, mas agora que eles estão indo pra uma excursão escolar em Seoul, ele tem esperança de conseguir pelo menos começar a conversar com ela, mesmo apesar de ser muito introvertido. Porém, tem coisas estranhas acontecendo em Seoul… Algo terrível está prestes a dominar a cidade… Nesse dia, Seoul de repente é…?

title.en: The Edgeless Sword From the Village

altTitles.ja: 冬月

description.en: A gay sorceror and a seductive priestess cross paths in an Online RPG.
description.fr: Suivez les aventures d'un sorcier gay et d'une jolie prêtresse en plein cœur d'un RPG.
description.ro: Un vrajitor homosexual si o preoteasa seductiva se intalnesc din intamplare intr-un online RPG
description.pt-br: Um feiticeiro homossexual e uma sacerdotisa sedutora se cruzam em um RPG online.

altTitles.ja: ウェディングピーチ

description.en:
One day, Momoko is attacked by Pluie, a demon who's after her keepsake ring left by her mother. Just then, the angel Limone gives Momoko the Sacred Mirror, allowing her to transform into the legendary Love Angel Wedding Peach and drive away demons! And so, Peach and her fellow angels fight to protect the lovers of the world from demons pursuing them for their "wave of love"...!
___
Chapter numbers for the Selene Scans version do not match up, but nothing is missing.

altTitles.en: The Demon Lord Levels Up With Martial Arts

description.en:
Now that the demonic realm and the heavenly realm have called a truce, the human world has returned to an era of peace.

Jeon Minchul lives the life of an ordinary college student until the day he comes across an artifact from the war and remembers — in his past life, he was the demon king who brought the world to its knees.

Upon recalling these memories, Minchul awakens his old powers, along with some new ones. But can this demon king harness the powers of both good and evil to protect the peace?
description.ko:
“마왕.”

그건.
인간이 되기 전, 전생의 나를 부르던 말이었다.

description.en: Tamako doesn't have any confidence, sex appeal, or romantic experiences. Caught off-guard while job-hunting, she is hired to work for an office full of suspicious people who specialize in designing for pachinko parlors. Thus, her days of agony begin to unfold.

altTitles.ja: アリスさんちの囲炉裏端

By the Furnace of Miss Alice’s House

description.en:
After ten years, Alice returns to her hometown from Tokyo to live alone in a traditional Japanese house with a sunken hearth. Harumi, her childhood friend, nervously meets her again after such a long time, but the warmth of the hearth with Alice is just as warm as it was in the past...

Next to the hearth in Miss Alice's house, let's have a leisurely meal together.
description.pt-br: Depois de 10 anos, Alice volta de Tóquio para a sua cidade natal e mora sozinha em uma antiga casa tradicional Japonesa com lareira. Harumi, um amigo de infância, estava animado para se encontrar novamente depois de muito tempo, mas o calor da lareira com Alice continua tão quente quanto no passado...

description.en: Some children are raised in the hands of Kwak No, After establishing a Disciple-Master relationship, the children dream of their own dreams by practicing martial arts and walking in that path to become masters. In order to make a living, Kwak No always had to leave his seat, and Seon-yu, the eldest of the children, has to take care of the Children, and He’ll be the Great Master.
description.ko:
삼류 낭인 곽노의 손에 거둬진 아이들.

사제관계를 맺고 아이들은 어설프게나마
무공과 보법 수련을 하며 각자의 꿈을 꾼다.

먹고살기 위해 곽노는 늘 자리를 비워야 했고,
아이들 중 맏이인 선유는 사제들을 돌봐야 한다.

그는 대사형大師兄이다.

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女にあこがれて

description.en:
Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)
description.fr:
**Je fais des choses tellement horribles à mes Magical Girls préférées !**

Moi, c’est Utena Hiiragi, et comme toutes les filles de mon âge, j’adore les magical girls !
Un jour, une étrange créature aux allures de mascotte m’a lancé un sort, et je suis devenue capable de me transformer, moi aussi !
Je vais pouvoir me battre aux côtés de mes héroïnes préférées !
Enfin, c’est ce que je croyais…

C’est quoi, cette tenue scandaleuse ?
Et comment ça, je suis au service du Mal ?!

Mais qu’est-ce que c’est que cette histoire ?!

**La comédie BDSM dans laquelle s’affrontent des Magical Girls !!**

**Avec ses personnages tous plus fous les uns que les autres, Looking Up to Magical Girls balaye les genres et nous place du côté du mal ! Akihiro Ononaka déploie tout l’arsenal BDSM à sa disposition pour nous proposer un concentré d’humour légèrement sexy et complètement déjanté !**

---
**Links:**
- [Official French](https://www.amazon.fr/Looking-up-Magical-Girls-1/dp/2382750731/)
description.es-la:
Hiiragi Utena, una chica que ama a las Chicas Mágicas, vive su vida cotidiana y desea ser como ellas.
Un día aparece un personaje curioso frente a ella y le ofrece el poder de hacer realidad sus deseos, pero...
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, ¡comienza la feroz batalla!
description.pt-br: Hiiragi Utena é uma garota apaixonada por Mahou Shoujo que sonhava em se tornar uma delas e poder lutar ao lado de sua heroína favorita. Certo dia, um mascote inesperadamente apareceu ao seu lado e lançou uma feitiço em Hiiragi, oferecendo a ela a oportunidade de estar de frente para sua ídolo. Entretanto, diferente do que ela esperava, a transformação a fez virar uma vilã ao invés de uma mahou shoujo. Para piorar, a mudança faz com que ela deixe de ser uma tímida garota e passe a ser uma dominatrix sádica. Agora Hiiragi precisará lidar com sua nova “profissão”, ao mesmo tempo que tenta aproveitar os momentos ao lado de sua heroína, por mais que seja para tentar torturá-la.

description.en:
The raid failed. 

In a desperate situation due to the impending suicide bombing of the dungeon boss, Lee Gon-woo was betrayed by his teammates, and abandoned in the boss’s room. Just when he thought it was all over, a dagger suddenly fell into his hands. And from that moment his life changed dramatically.

His life was saved, but all the levels he gained with such difficulty have reset, making him level 1.

[You have caught a "mosquito". Your level has increased.]

"My level should have gone up, but why is nothing happening?!"
description.ru:
Рэйд провалился. 
В отчаянном положении из-за готовящегося самоподрыва босса данжа преданный тиммейтами Ли Гон-у остался один в комнате босса.
Когда он думал, что уже всё кончено, неожиданно в его руки попадает кинжал. И с этого момента его жизнь кардинально меняется.
Его жизнь спасена, но он снова вернулся на первый уровень, который с таким трудом поднимал...
[Вы поймали "комара". Ваш уровень повышен.]
Действительно, уровень должен был подняться, но почему никаких изменений?

altTitles.ja: 君は008
君はダブルオーエイト

description.en:
Akashi Eito has failed miserably on all high school admissions exams but somehow, he receives a letter of acceptance from a school he does not remember applying for. He nevertheless happily enrolls, expecting to live the ideal school life, but his aspiration are quickly destroyed as he discovers that this mysterious school is a training institution for secret agents!   
  
Immediately, Eito wants to return home and live a normal life with his normal family, until the director of the school makes a shocking revelation: Eito's deceased father was also a secret agent! He subsequently wants to know more about the past and memories of his father, so he decides to stay in this school. However, as a student of this institution, Eito will have to face a deadly exam made to test the skills of all new students…  
  
Follow this story of action and espionage, in which our hero, who lacks physical strength, compensates for it with great bravery, and captivates everyone around him with the power of his courage and friendship!!

altTitles.ja: 水のともだちカッパーマン

description.en: Kawataro, half human, half kappa, lives as a human, because his father, a kappa, wished so. Kawataro travels to find his mother who disappeared when he was young. On his trip, he encounters various youkai.

altTitles.ja: 精霊の農夫

altTitles.th: ชาวสวนภูตคุมวิญญาณ

description.en: After training for 11 years to reach superhuman status, I gave up on my dream and returned to the family farm. But suddenly, Hawa appeared! She’s a powerful farming spirit who can make anything grow—even produce that enhances people’s powers. Now I’ve got my superhuman ID card, more spirits-friends, mouthwatering Grade A+ crops, and quests! Will Hawa and her friends lead us all to fame and fortune and change our lives forever?
description.ja:
超人たちがあらゆる分野で活躍する世界。 金村健吾は、モンスターを倒す超人になろうと小さい頃から訓練を積んでいたが挫折。 その間に弟の金村慎吾が保証人になって姿をくらまし、兄は超人になる夢を諦め帰農した。 しかし、そこで農業の精霊ハワと出会うのだが…！

11년 동안 초인이 되기 위해서 노력했지만 결국 일반인으로 끝난 이건우.

description.ru:
Обычный среднестатистический гражданин Кореи, отчаянно пытавшийся стать героем на протяжении 11 лет, осознал, что это не его ремесло и не его мечтания. Бросив все, Ли Ген Ву решил стать фермером и жить своей тихой жизнью. Но все ли так просто?

description.en: While the demons were rising, mankind was about to become extinct. Six temples rose, and protected the last of mankind. A young boy joins the temple as a knight to save his mother. During his journey of wonders and mischief in the world of temples and demons, will he be able to ascend to become the strongest knight and inherit the throne?
description.it: demoni erano in aumento e l'umanità era sul punto di estinguersi. Sei templi rosa proteggono quanto rimasto del genere umano. Un giovane ragazzo si unisce ad un tempio come cavaliere per salvare sua madre iniziando un viaggio nel mondo dei templi e dei demoni. Sarà egli in grado di salire di livello sino a diventare il cavaliere più forte sino ad ereditare il trono?
description.pt: Enquanto os demônios estavam em ascensão, a humanidade estava prestes a extinguir-se. Seis templos se ergueram e protegeram a humanidade. Um garoto que se junta aos templos como um cavaleiro para salvar sua mãe. Durante sua jornada nas maravilhas e males em um mundo de templos e demônios, será ele capaz de subir e tornar-se o cavaleiro mais forte a herdar o trono?!

altTitles.ja: 今日から始める幼なじみ

description.en:
Kaede Yuzuki is Kouhei Aida's new neighbor, both at home and in the classroom. Kouhei tries to be friendly with Kaede, but their conversations lead nowhere. But then one day…
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)

10 years after the night of starfall, city S was destroyed by the biggest recorded monster outbreak in history. Zuo Fan, carrying the name of [A traitor’s son], as well as being the most useless starfall warrior reserve who ran away, awakened the Super Warrior System during a trap disguised as a raid. Since then, he has embarked on the road of success, rising like a meteor. All the while, searching for the truth of his father’s treason amidst the strong opposition, and gradually commencing on the thorny road of saving the world.

description.en: (Gentle, tenacious honor student and the cold domineering girl) Chi Tang and Youyu are both weirdos in Year 1 Class 2 of high school. They become desk mates, roommates, each other's salvation, protecting the other's warmth. The relationship between the two went from ignorance to understanding. A poem of youth composed.
description.zh: （温柔坚韧学霸&骄横高冷少女）池唐和游余都是高一二班被敬而远之的异类，她们成为同桌和室友，也成为救赎、保护彼此的温暖。两人的感情从懵懂到刻骨，谱写一首青春的诗歌。

description.de:
In dem mysteriösen, einem RPG Dungeon ähnelnden Turm lebt der alle berühmten Hunter beneidende Gong-Ja Kim sein alltägliches Leben.
Eines Tages wird sein Wunsch nach mehr mit einem legendären Skill beantwortet, mit dem er die Fähigkeiten anderer kopieren kann ... auf Kosten seines eigenen Lebens.
Bevor er einen Sinn daraus ziehen kann, wird er vom Rang 1 Hunter, dem Flame Emperor, ermordet!
Das aktiviert aber seinen Skill und nun besitzt er einen neuen, nämlich die Möglichkeit, durch seinen Tod in der Zeit zurückzureisen.
Wie wird Gong-Ja dieses Skills nutzen, um seine Konkurrenz zu überflügeln und die Spitze zu erreichen?
description.en:
In the mysterious, RPG dungeon-like Tower, Gongja Kim lives a mundane existence, envying all the star hunters. One day, his wish for more is granted with a legendary skill to copy others’ abilities… at the cost of his life. Before he can make sense of it, he’s killed by the #1 hunter, the Flame Emperor! But this activates his skill and now he’s copied a new one, the ability to travel back in time upon death.

How will Gongja use these skills to outplay the competition and rise to the top?
description.id:
Sebuah menara tiba-tiba muncul di dunia. Dari sisi mana pun di bumi, menara tersebut tetap terlihat menembus horizon. Berbagai monster memenuhi tiap lantai yang ada di menara itu. Orang yang masuk dalam menara itu ternyata bisa mendapatkan skill! Semua orang akhirnya berbondong-bondong untuk memburu para monster dan menjadi hunter kelas dunia.

"Tapi aku hanya hunter kelas F yang tidak punya skill apa-apa, aku juga mau skill kelas S! Tunggu..."

CRING!

"Itu... Kartu emas? Akhirnya kemunculan skill-ku datang juga?"

[Skill Level S+]
[BISA MENDUPLIKASI SKILL ORANG YANG MEMBUNUHMU, HANYA TERAKTIVASI KETIKA KAMU MATI]

"Skill ini... Apa gunanya skill semacam ini?!"

身處F級底層的獵人「金孔子」
長久以來一直羨慕著排行第一的獵人「炎帝」。
某天，他竟突然獲得了S+級的技能。
不料，短暫開心過後，

description.en: Army veteran's last go at the obstacle course turns lethal after a simple fall. A goddess presents an opportunity at new life as a hero! The protagonist ain't having any of it, he was supposed to retire and become a civilian. The arrogant Goddess drops him down to survive while having her own evil schemes. How will his new life progress after encountering another Goddess, a spy and his past life's junior?

altTitles.ja: 不揃いの連理

description.en:
From Newtype site:  
  
Our ages are different, our ways of life are different, everything is different. But… I just want to be with you!  
Because I've never been in a miserable, tragic romance, I can say that unrequited love is fine…  
I don't know why I fell in love with this person…it's a mystery!  
  
They have different personalities, different ages, different ways of thinking, different looks, different everything.  
This is the story of girls who clumsily make up for what's lacking in the other.  
  
T/N:  
These are side stories. Not a rewrite of the original serialized twitter comic. It builds up on what happens in the main series in a longer format. It eventually merges with the main series in the volume edition.
   
The kind of stories these are is all in the title!  
  
不揃 (fuzoroi) means uneven, irregular, but also incomplete. 連理 (renri) is "entwined relationship".  

So, these are stories of intimate relationships between "incomplete" girls that somehow complete each other, against all odds.

altTitles.ja: 黒幕夫に惚れられました

description.en:
I've been reincarnated as the extra character who stalked her husband, the male lead, for 10 years and died. Of course, I tried to divorce him before the female lead appeared.

But, I found out that my young husband was secretly abused in the house. At that moment, I immediately became overwhelmed with the responsibility and sense of duty a modern adult would have. 

**

Aiden had his back turned away from her and suddenly grabbed her arm forcefully. The strength of his hands alone could have ripped her arms off. Erin timidly called his name and spoke. 

"I already reminded you yesterday. We're a married couple, so I'm always on your side." 

"..."

"So, everything is alright." 

She comforted him with these sweet words like it was a spell. And as if he was under her magic, Aiden stopped trembling. 

**

The adult Erin requested to divorce her husband Aiden before the female lead appeared. As soon as those words left her lips, Aiden's smile disappeared. 

"A divorce? Never."

Aiden tore the divorce papers into such thin sheets, the contents were no longer legible. Erin smiled at the sight. (Synopsis source: Gourmet Scans)

---
Ellen's plan is simple. Before turning into an obsessive villain who gets executed, she's going to get a divorce! But after she becomes Ellen Lianster, her plan gets complicated. Her new husband, Aiden, has developed a debilitating fear of being touched, and Ellen is determined to discover the cause and cure. As she finds ways to help him, an affection-deprived Aiden slowly begins to seek comfort from Ellen. With both hearts opening up to each other, can this marriage succeed... at failing?
description.fr: J'ai été réincarnée en tant que la figurante qui a harcelé son mari, le rôle masculin principal, pendant 10 ans et qui est morte. Bien sûr, j'ai essayé de divorcer avant que le personnage principal féminin n'apparaisse. Mais j'ai découvert que la nounou de mon jeune mari abusait secrètement de lui. À ce moment-là, j'ai immédiatement été submergée par la responsabilité et le sens du devoir d'un adulte moderne. *** Aiden, qui lui tournait le dos, lui a soudainement saisi le bras avec force. La seule force de ses mains aurait pu lui arracher les bras. Erin l'appela timidement et prit la parole. «Je te l'ai déjà rappelé hier. Nous sommes un couple marié, alors je suis toujours de ton côté.» «...» «Alors, tout va bien.» Elle le réconforta avec ces mots doux comme s'il s'agissait d'un sortilège. Et comme s'il était sous sa magie, Aiden cessa de trembler. *** Erin, adulte, a demandé le divorce à son mari Aiden avant que le personnage principal féminin n'apparaisse. Dès que ces mots ont quitté ses lèvres, le sourire d'Aiden a disparu. «Un divorce? Jamais.» Aiden a déchiré les papiers du divorce en feuilles si fines que le contenu n'était plus lisible. Erin sourit à cette vue.
description.zh: 漫画简介: 社牛打工人穿成会被疯批男主处死的小恶女，却意外发现10岁的男主是个缺爱小可怜。每天糯叽叽黏人的正太小乖乖，在小恶女的养成下，还会成为腹黑疯批吗？

description.en:
Kim Shin, a special killer who gathered men from all over the country and made the Organization 'Baek-Yi' to destroy the absolute power 'Castle' of the underworld.

Through a negotiation he got inside the Castle and started working with the enemy... Will Kim Shin be able to take down the Castle and complete his revenge as he hoped.

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: ブラックチャンネル

description.en: In order to make his videos more entertaining, the demonic Youtuber Black (and his sidekick Camera-chan) makes contracts with humans to film their despicable true natures by giving them mysterious powers and teach them a lesson to expose the hidden side of humans, games, and hobbies.

altTitles.en: Let's Have a Toast With Miso Soup!

altTitles.ja: 味噌汁でカンパイ！

description.en:
Zenichirou is a middle school student raised in a motherless family. His breakfast always consists of onigiri and instant miso soup from the convenience store. Yae, a childhood friend of Zenichirou, cannot stand to see him eat such an innutritious breakfast, so she decides to make him breakfast every morning…  
  
This story conveys a simple message: eating with another person makes miso soup taste more delicious and hearty!

description.en: Rintaro Shido, a high school student who aspires to become a full-time househusband, is in the class with a very popular idol, Rei Otosaki. The two have no connection other than being classmates, but their relationship changes drastically when Rintaro serves Rei a home-cooked meal after she nearly collapses from hunger! The food was so delicious that Rei said, "Can I come here every day to eat?"...?!
description.ja: 専業主夫を目指す高校生・志藤凛太郎のクラスには、世間でも大人気のアイドル・乙咲玲が在籍していた。同級生であること以外の関係がない二人だったが、空腹で倒れそうになった玲に凛太郎が手料理を振る舞ったことで関係は一変！ あまりの美味しさに玲は「毎日食べに来ていい？」と言ってきて……!?
description.vi: Shido Rintaro, nam sinh cao trung ước ao trở thành một ông chồng nội trợ, học cùng lớp với idol nổi tiếng Otosaki Rei. Cả hai không liên quan gì đến nhau trừ việc học cùng lớp. Đó là cho đến khi Rei xém ngất xỉu vì đói, và được Rintaro nấu ăn cho. Tay nghề cậu ta khá đến nỗi Rei quyết định sẽ đến ăn chực mỗi ngày...!?
description.pt-br: Rintaro Shido, um estudante do ensino médio que aspira se tornar um dono de casa em tempo integral, está na classe de uma idol muito popular, Rei Otosaki. Os dois não têm nenhuma conexão além de serem colegas de classe, mas seu relacionamento muda drasticamente quando Rintaro serve uma refeição caseira para Rei depois que ela quase desmaia de fome! A comida estava tão deliciosa que Rei disse: "Posso vir aqui todos os dias para comer?"...?!

description.ar: رحلة الوصول إلى قمة فنون القتال هي رحلة وحيدة موحشة وطويلة. في مواجهة الشدائد يجب عليك البقاء على قيد الحياة والقتال بلا هوادة، وعندها فقط يمكنك الارتقاء ومتابعة رحلتك لتصبح الأقوى. تختبر طائفة الجناح السماوي الأعلى تلاميذها بأقسى الطرق لإعدادهم لهذه الرحلة، وفي أحد الأيام تمكن المتدرب الضعيف يانغ كاي من الحصول على كتاب أسود مما جعله على الطريق إلى قمة عالم فنون القتال.
description.en:
The peak of martial arts is solitary and lonely. It is an endless pursuit for unattainable heights as well. In order to surpass the limits of martial arts, growth and the will to survive in adverse situations is necessary.
One day, Yang Kai, a disciple-on-trial (and floor sweeper) of the Lingxiao Martial Arts Sect discovered a Wordless Black Book. That marked the turn in his luck and the beginning of his martial arts journey.
description.fr: Le chemin vers le sommet martial (Martial Peak) est long et solitaire. Face à l’adversité, il faut survivre et persévérer. Il est alors possible de percer et poursuivre l'ascension pour devenir le plus fort. Le Haut Pavillon Céleste entraîne ses disciples de la manière la plus sévère afin de les préparer à ce voyage. Un beau jour, le modeste balayeur Yang Kai met la main sur un livre noir, le lançant sur la route vers l'apogée du monde martial.
description.ru: Путь на вершину боевых искусств - путь одинокий и длинный. Перед лицом невзгод ты должен оставаться сильным и неотступным. Только тогда ты сможешь преодолеть все препятствия и стать по-настоящему сильным. Небесная Башня обучает своих учеников самым суровым образом, чтобы они могли выстоять в мире боевых искусств. Но только из-за одного самого незначительного проступка наш главный герой, Янг Кай, может быть исключен из Небесной Башни.
description.uk: Шлях до бойової вершини - самотній, відлюдний і довгий. Перед обличчям негараздів ти повинен вижити і залишатися непохитним. Тільки тоді ти зможеш прорватися і продовжити свій шлях, щоб стати найсильнішим. Небесна вершина випробовує своїх учнів найсуворішими способами, щоб підготувати їх до цієї подорожі. Одного разу скромному підмітальнику Ян Каю вдалося роздобути чорну книгу, яка відкриває йому шлях до вершини світу бойових мистецтв.
description.zh: 《武炼巅峰》漫画版是由深圳漫画团队噼咔噼绘制，根据阅文集团旗起点中文网的同名小说改编，作者是莫默。武之巅峰，是孤独，是寂寞，是漫漫求索，是高处不胜寒。逆境中成长，绝地里求生，才能堪破武之极道。凌霄阁试炼弟子兼扫地小厮杨开偶获一本无字黑书，从此踏上漫漫武道。
description.es-la: El viaje hacia la cima marcial es solitario y largo. Ante la adversidad, debes sobrevivir y permanecer inflexible. Solo entonces podrás avanzar y continuar tu viaje para convertirte en el más fuerte. El "Pabellón Cielo Alto" pone a prueba a sus discípulos de las formas más duras para prepararlos para este viaje. Un día, el humilde barrendero Yang Kai logró obtener un libro negro, lo que lo puso en el camino hacia la cima del mundo marcial.
description.pt-br: A jornada para o Pico Marcial é algo longo e solitário. Indo de encontro com a adversidade, você deve sobreviver e permanecer vivo. Apenas aqueles que superarem os limites continuarão a jornada rumo ao objetivo de se tornar o mais forte. A Sky Tower testa seus discípulos de maneiras bem complexas para esta jornada. Um dia, o menosprezado Yang Kai conseguiu obter um livro negro, fazendo-o tomar rumo ao pico do mundo marcial.

altTitles.ja: 不滅のあなたへ

altTitles.th: แด่เธอผู้เป็นนิรันดร์

description.en:
An immortal being was sent to the surface of the earth and met a boy living alone in the middle of tundra.   
The being can take the shape of dying things, but only if the "impetus" is stronger than the previous one. What sort of experiences and meetings will the being encounter while living forever?   

---   
- **Won the 43rd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2019** 
   
---

**Links:**  
**Officially Translated:**   
- Alternative English version by [K MANGA](<https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10076/episode/319887>)
- Alternative English version by [Inkr Comics](<https://inkr.page.link/Hmgv5BX51rftn9ar5>)
- In French by [Pika](<https://www.pika.fr/serie/your-eternity>)   
- In Italian by [Star Comics](<https://www.starcomics.com/fumetto.aspx?Fumetto=281315>)   
- In Polish by [Kotori](<http://kotori.pl/nasze-wydania/ku-twej-wiecznosci/>)   
- In Russian by [Istari](<https://istaricomics.com/katalog-knig/manga/istari-comics/to-your-eternity/>)   
- In German by [Egmont](<https://www.egmont-shop.de/to-your-eternity-01.html>)   
- In Indonesian by [m&c!](<http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/untukmu-yang-abadi-01>) as **Untukmu yang Abadi** (2019)
- In Brazilian Portuguese by [NewPOP](<https://www.lojanewpop.com.br/uma-vida-imortal-to-your-eternity-15576289>)
description.fr:
"C'est à l'épreuve de la réalité que je saurai ce que je suis... Voilà pourquoi mon voyage commence."

Un être sous forme d'une petite sphère est envoyé sur terre, celle-ci change d'apparence en fonction de ce qu'elle rencontre.
Elle rencontre d'abord un loup puis un jeune garçon vivant seul au milieu d'un paysage enneigé. Chaque nouvelle rencontre est une occasion de vivre de nouvelles expérience pour cet être. Ainsi commence le voyage de l'Immortel, un voyage fait d'expériences et de rencontres dans un monde implacable...
description.ja: 『聲の形』の大今良時が贈る、永遠の旅。真っ白な魂で世界に降り立つ！──現実だけが自分が誰なのかを教えてくれる。だから僕は、旅に出る。
description.ru: Отправленное на землю бессмертное существо знакомится с мальчиком, одиноко живущим в Тундре. Существо может принимать форму умерших, но только если «импульс» сильнее предыдущего. С какими впечатлениями и встречами столкнётся существо, живущее вечно?
description.pt-br:
Um ser imortal foi enviado à superfície da terra e encontrou um menino que vivia sozinho no meio da tundra.
O ser pode assumir a forma de coisas moribundas, mas somente se o "ímpeto" for mais forte que o anterior. Que tipo de experiências e encontros o ser encontrará enquanto viver para sempre?

---
- **Ganhou o 43º Prêmio Kodansha Manga na categoria shounen em 2019**

description.en:
Sangjin seems like your typical average joe working part-time at a convenience store. That is until you find out he lives with a human-eating monster. To keep the monster's appetite satisfied, he feeds the monster humans whom he deems to be trash of the world. One day, a girl named Jiwon, who believes the monster to be a god, decides to move in with the two. With the police closing in on Sangjin as the main suspect in the recent disappearances, how long will he be able to get away with this?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/SUSPENSE/bushidongwu/list?title_no=1845)

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/thriller/thepredator/list?title_no=3425)

description.id:
Sangjin, seorang pria berusia 25 tahun, memiliki teman yang berubah menjadi monster di samping kamarnya. Untuk mencari mangsa monster itu, dia mencari manusia yang penuh keserakahan dan kebusukan setiap malam. Apakah Sangjin dan monster itu benar-benar penyelamat umat manusia? atau hanya sepasang predator?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/SUSPENSE/bushidongwu/list?title_no=1845)

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/thriller/thepredator/list?title_no=3425)

description.ko:
스물다섯 취준생 상진의 옆방에는 괴물이 된 친구가 살고 있다.
괴물의 먹이를 구하기 위해
매일 밤 탐욕과 혐오로 가득한 인간들을 찾아 나선다.
상진과 괴물은 과연 인류의 구원자인가? 포식자인가?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/SUSPENSE/bushidongwu/list?title_no=1845)

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/thriller/thepredator/list?title_no=3425)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/thriller/the-predator/list?title_no=3224)
description.zh:
朋友变成了恐怖的怪物！
但他要吃贪婪罪恶的活物？
在便利店打工的待业青年尚振，他的隔壁住着一个变成了怪物的朋友——善宇。为了给善宇寻找食物，他每晚都要出门寻找那些贪婪龌龊，卑鄙罪恶的社会败类。这一人一兽到底是救星还是灾难呢？

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/SUSPENSE/bushidongwu/list?title_no=1845)

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/thriller/thepredator/list?title_no=3425)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/thriller/the-predator/list?title_no=3224)
description.pt-br: Sangjin parece o típico cara comum trabalhando meio período em um supermercado. Isso até você descobrir que ele mora com um monstro comedor de humanos. Para manter o apetite do monstro satisfeito, ele o alimenta com humanos que ele considera o lixo do mundo. Um dia, uma garota chamada Jiwon, que acredita que o monstro é um deus, decide morar com os dois. Com a polícia se aproximando de Sangjin como principal suspeito dos recentes desaparecimentos, por quanto tempo ele conseguirá escapar impune?
description.zh-hk:
25歲的待業生尚真，隔壁住著一個變成怪物的朋友，為了餵食他，尚真每晚都會外出尋找貪孽又邪惡的人類...他們兩個，究竟是人類的救援者？還是掠食者？

---

altTitles.ja: 嫌がってるキミが好き

altTitles.en: I Like You With That Look of Repulsion

description.en:
It finally happened, Shirakawa Mikoto was confessed to for the first time in her life! Otsuki Makoto wasn’t exactly her ideal man but, she wanted to have a boyfriend to show off to her friends. It turns out dating someone you don’t even know can be complicated, especially if they are a bit strange.  
This is a raunchy, heart pounding love story. Expect goosebumps and some doki doki action on the side.

altTitles.ja: からかい上手(?)の西片さん

altTitles.tl: Ang Magaling sa Panunuksong (?) si Nishikata-san

description.en: In this spinoff of "Teasing Master Takagi-san", and continuation of "Teasing Master (nee) Takagi-san", Chi Nishikata tries her hardest to tease her classmate Ooshiro, but for some reason it feels like she's met him somewhere. Can she finally get one over on him and remember her past?
description.tl: Si Chi, ang minamahal na anak ng (dating) Takagi at Nishikata. Ngayon ay nasa high school na kasama ang batang lalaki sa tabi, kaya ba n'yang tuksuhin s'ya tulad ng kanyang ina?! O s'ya ba ang matutukso tulad ng kanyang ama!? Ang mga araw na puno ng pang-aasar ay magsisimula na muli— !
description.uk: Це спін-офф манг "Майстер дражнилок Такаґі-сан" та "Майстер дражнилок(колишня) Такаґі-сан". Донька головних героїв Чі іде до школи і зустрічає друга дитинства. Як складуться їх відносини і чи зможе вона подражнити хлопця?
description.pt-br: Neste spin-off de "Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san" e continuação de "Karakai Jouzu no (Moto) Takagi-san", Nishikata Chi se esforça ao máximo para provocar seu colega de classe Ooshiro, mas por algum motivo parece que ela o conhece de algum lugar. Ela pode finalmente superá-lo e lembrar de seu passado?

title.en: Ano Hi Mita Hana no Namae o Boku-tachi wa Mada Shiranai.

altTitles.tl: Hindi pa rin Namin Alam ang Pangalan ng Bulaklak na Nakita Namin noong Araw na Iyon

altTitles.id: Kita masih belum tahu nama bunga yang kita lihat hari itu

altTitles.ja: あの日見た花の名前を僕達はまだ知らない。

altTitles.zh-hk: 我們仍未知道那天所看見的花名

altTitles.ko: 그날 본 꽃의 이름을 우리들은 아직 모른다.

altTitles.ne: त्यो दिन हामीले देखेको फूलको नाम हामीलाई अझै थाहा छैन।

altTitles.en: We Still Don't Know the Name of the Flower We Saw That Day.

description.en:
Jinta Yadomi and his group of childhood friends have become estranged after a tragic accident split them apart. Now in their high school years, a sudden surprise forces each of them to confront their guilt over what happened that day and come to terms with the ghosts of their past.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics (2019)
description.es-la: Un grupo de amigos de la infancia se separa a causa de la muerte de una amiga del grupo, Menma. Ahora Jintan, un integrante del grupo, puede ver el espiritu de Menma que quiere cumplir un deseo, pero para eso, Jintan deberá reunir a sus antiguos amigos de la infancia, el problema es que ellos han cambiado mucho. Jintan tiene que ayudar a Menma a cumplir su deseo y así poder ir al "cielo".
description.pt-br: Um grupo de seis amigos de infância se separam após um deles, Honma "Menma" Meiko, morrer em um acidente. Dez anos seguintes desta tragédia, o líder do grupo, Yadomi Jinta, isola-se da sociedade e vive recluso. Em um dia de verão, porém, Menma aparece para Jinta, com uma aparência mais velha, pedindo-lhe ajuda para realizar seu desejo. Ela acredita que precisa realizá-lo para cumprir seu destino. Só que Menma não lembra qual era seu desejo, fazendo com que Jinta reúna seus amigos de infância outra vez, pois acredita que eles sejam a chave para resolver esse problema. No entanto, os sentimentos escondidos, os conflitos internos e a persistência dos sentimentos de tristeza pelos pais de Menma, resultam em complicações para o grupo, enquanto eles lutam não só para ajudarem Menma, mas a si mesmos.

altTitles.ja: ランカーの帰還

description.en:
During the early years of the hottest MMORPG called Arena, the world’s top ranker Meleegod vanished after setting every possible record in the virtual world.

In the real world, this deathly melee damage dealer was the happy-go-lucky Kang Hyeonu, who simply deleted his character and quit his hobby to finish mandatory military service and inherit his father’s company.

This rosy future dissolves within two years when a business rival makes his father go bankrupt. Hyeonu struggles to make ends meet with a string of part-time jobs, but his best friend has a better idea. He urges Hyeonu to conquer the Arena once again and earn a cushy living as a gaming celebrity.

Vowing to strike it rich and avenge his father, the former Meleegod returns to the Arena as a newbie. Only this time, he’s out for blood!

---

**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (Ridibooks)](https://ridibooks.com/books/4357000090)
- [Alternative Raw (Naver)](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6433067)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation (BiliBili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30486)
- [Official Japanese Translation (Piccoma)](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77017)
description.ja: バーチャルリアリティーゲーム「アレナ」の初期、最強最高のランカーだったメレーゴッド！ キャラクターを削除して忽然と姿を消していた彼が、人生のどん底から這い上がるためにまたアレナに戻ってきた！ 「感謝、絶望、復讐、全部晴らしてやる！」
description.ko:
가상현실게임 <아레나> 초창기,
최강최고의 랭커였던 밀리갓!

캐릭터를 삭제하고 홀연히 떠났던 그가
망해버린 집안을 일으키기 위해 다시 아레나에 돌아왔다!

“캐릭터를 생성하시겠습니까?”
description.ru:
В былые времена Миллигат был самым лучшим игроком и очень долгое время занимал первое место в мировом топе игры «Арена»...

Однажды, устав от Арены, он решил удалить свой аккаунт и заняться личной жизнью.

Прошло 2 года. Семья разрушена, бизнес потерян, и у него ничего не осталось...

От безысходности Миллигат решил вернуться туда, где всё начиналось... В Арену.

«Вы уверены, что хотите создать персонажа»?

Трепещите, мерзавцы и обычные игроки... Король вернулся.
description.zh: 虚拟现实游戏《幻神》创建初期最强最厉害的玩家，“米利神”高泽宇，曾经把角色删除后毫无留恋地离开了游戏，但为了拯救没落的家庭，他再次返回到此游戏当中…… “您要创建一个新角色吗？”

altTitles.ja: 愛しています、キョーコさん。

altTitles.en: You mean the world to me, Kyoko!

description.en: Always leave work on the dot! Always avoid overtime! Because my beloved Kyouko-san is waiting for me to return.  I love, love, love, love, love, love you, Kyouko-san, who has secrets that I don't know.  A comedic love about vibration and too much love with a little distortion.

In a world overrun by zombies, survival is difficult, but I suddenly gained an all-purpose apocalyptic upgrade system.
What is this?!
By killing the zombie and completing tasks, you can earn upgrade points that can be used to upgrade anything. With this, I no longer fear material scarcity, I just have to keep upgrading. From fruit cores to trees that last for millennia, from wild fields to super farms, from broken guns to plasma explosive weapons, from peas to super zombie-killers, and from paper airplanes to F22s. With this system, a single person is equivalent to a whole city!
description.zh: 丧尸末世，艰难求生，可突然得到了一个万物升级系统。什么？打丧尸做任务得到的升级点数可以拿来升级任何东西！那我还怕什么物资匮乏，不停的升级就是，果核升级成万年果树；野田升级成超级农场；坏掉的手枪升级成等离子爆矢枪；豌豆升级成超级丧尸杀手；纸飞机升级成F22。有此系统在手，一人即一城！

title.en: World Teacher – Other World Style Education & Agent

altTitles.ru: World Teacher: Иной мир образования и шпионажа
World Teacher: Обучение по заветам другого мира
Мировой учитель: Иной мир образования и шпионажа
Мировой учитель: Наставник из иного мира
Мировой учитель: Образование и шпионаж иного мира

altTitles.ja: ワールド・ティーチャー -異世界式教育エージェント-

description.en:
A man who was once called the world’s strongest agent ended up becoming a teacher after his retirement, to train a new generation of agents. After many years of training his disciples, he was killed at the age of 60 by a secret organization’s ruse and was reincarnated in another world with his memories intact. Though he was surprised by the existence of magic and the strange species in that world, he quickly adapted to his condition as a newborn and took advantage of it. He acquired special magic and gained a massive amount of strength thanks to his rigorous discipline, in order to reach his goal: Resume his career as a teacher which he left halfway through in his previous life.  
  
This is the story of a man, who, based on the memories and the experiences of his previous life, became a teacher who travels through the world with his students.  
  
Adaptation of a Light Novel.  
  


---
description.ru:
Некогда сильнейший агент, Сириус, пожертвовав собой ради товарищей, переродился в другом мире.  
  
Не успев закончить подготовку своих преемников в прошлом мире, он, вооружившись оставшимися знаниями и опытом, берётся учить окружающих его людей и круто меняет всю их жизнь. Для одних он станет наставником, а для других — быть может, чем-то большим…  
  


---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In Russian by/на русском [Istari Comics Publishing/Истари комикс](https://readmanga.live/world_teacher__other_world_style_education___agent)

description.en:
The battle for the scholarship raged like wildfire. At the entrance of the school director’s office, Lin Yujing and Shen Wan came face to face.

After exhausting their tears, the two people stared at each other blankly for three seconds before turning around in unison and leaving.

Shen Wan got onto his private helicopter while Lin Yujing climbed into her Rolls-Royce.

–This is a story of two rich people trying their best to look poor in front of the other.

altTitles.zh-ro: Xing Meng Ou Xiang Ji Hua

description.en: The shining lights, the magnificent stage! Friendships created through singing, making a future through dancing, the girls embark on their journey towards their dreams! One who has lost status due to a scandal is hiding a plot behind her back. A pair of bosom friends, separated by fate. A girl who tries to exonerate her mother sets off on her journey for a talent competition. When the stage turns into an empty battlefield, she uses her voice to chase after her dreams.

Be it Guan Yunchang, the Saint of War, Xiang Yu, the Hegemon King of Chu,  the below one and above all, Lu Fengxian, or Oboi, each pair is going to face off each other in a life-death battle. The ultimate winner shall be granted a wish. [Remake]
